mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into task_truck_order (truck_task_id, app_user_id, order_number, `name`, money, integral, add_money, add_integral, `state`, singapore_area_id, rally_point_id, create_time, `comment`) values (#{truckTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update task_truck_order set truck_task_id = #{truckTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_user_id = #{appUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_money = #{addMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_integral = #{addIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, singapore_area_id = #{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rally_point_id = #{rallyPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `comment` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where task_order_id = #{taskOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select task_order_id, truck_task_id, app_user_id, order_number, `name`, money, integral, add_money, add_integral, `state`, singapore_area_id, rally_point_id, create_time, `comment`,order_type from task_truck_order where task_order_id = #{taskOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select task_order_id, truck_task_id, app_user_id, order_number, `name`, money, integral, add_money, add_integral, `state`, singapore_area_id, rally_point_id, create_time, `comment` from task_truck_order

select task_order_id, truck_task_id, app_user_id, order_number, `name`, money, integral, add_money, add_integral, `state`, singapore_area_id, rally_point_id, create_time, `comment` from task_truck_order where app_user_id =#{appUserId} AND create_time = #{createTime} AND `state` = 3

select task_order_id, truck_task_id, app_user_id, order_number, `name`, money, integral, add_money, add_integral, `state`, singapore_area_id, rally_point_id, create_time, `comment` from task_truck_order where create_time = #{createTime}

select task_order_id, truck_task_id, app_user_id, order_number, `name`, money, integral, add_money, add_integral, `state`, singapore_area_id, rally_point_id, create_time, `comment` from task_truck_order where order_number = #{orderNumber}

select task_order_id, truck_task_id, app_user_id, order_number, `name`, money, integral, add_money, add_integral, `state`, singapore_area_id, rally_point_id, create_time, `comment` from task_truck_order where app_user_id = #{appUserId} and `state` = 3
